text: Anton Sintsov (born 3 February 1985) is a Russian road and mountain bike racer. He rode at the cross-country event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. He was on the start list for the 2018 Cross-country European Championship and he finished 7th. ==Major results== ;2008 : 1st Gara Ciclistica Milionaria : 2nd Giro Ciclisto del Cigno ;2010 : 3rd Gara Ciclistica Montappone ;2014 : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Mountain Bike Championships ;2017 : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Mountain Bike Championships ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Russia Category:Sportspeople from Izhevsk
title: Anton Sintsov
